Topic.Title: Alibaba Throws Money at Yahoo!

Message.Msg: What I meant is that if Alibaba Group will use this money to buyback YHOO preferred shares ($835M), then it would significantly impacted YHOO shares which means YHOO is definitely going higher with this news my personal opinion only. If the market finds this significant, then my closing target for YHOO on Monday is $25.75 to $26.

Topic.Title: $1b for the preferred + $600m yen bet

Message.Msg: News from China that Alibaba is working on a $9B ffinancing to buyback YHOO's preferred shares ($935). If this is confirmed Monday I think it will bump up YHOO shares my personal opinion.

Message.Title: Growth-rate of Monthly Unique Visitors of LOCM is 50% higher than Yelp's - and buy of Yelp through Yahoo would be a joke
Message.Msg: Yelp has only 96% of the Monthly Unique Visitors of Local Corp, but the 53-fold market-cap (Market-Cap of Local Corp = 38 million, Market-Cap of Yelp = 2,010 million) Local Corp development of Unique Visitors: 11/2012: 18,745,842 Monthly Unique Visitors 12/2012: 22,738,206 Monthly Unique Visitors 01/2013: 26,410,927 Monthly Unique Visitors 02/2013: 24,017,605 Monthly Unique Visitors 03/2013: 24,427,755 Monthly Unique Visitors An increase of 22.63% year-over-year. Compare with the development of Yelp's Unique Visitors: 11/2012: 19,358,705 Monthly Unique Visitors 12/2012: 21,017,483 Monthly Unique Visitors 01/2013: 22,293,301 Monthly Unique Visitors 02/2013: 21,063,155 Monthly Unique Visitors 03/2013: 23,364,095 Monthly Unique Visitors An increase of 14.94% year-over-year

Topic.Title: Don't forget that Jack Ma is a weasel who stole Alipay and held YHOO hostage leading to....

Message.Msg: Well in reality look at it from this other side. Yaho invested $1B, from that they got $6B + $800M of preferred with 10% of earnings + 24%. If they sell half their position for about $8B and latter they will sell the remaining at about $12B more. That is $26B on their $1B in less than 10 years, that return is insane!

Topic.Title: Where are those idiot losers Dr. Gloom and hotmodel (the insecure stalker) to tell us Alibaba not worth much and.....

Message.Msg: Insecure stalker??? You're the one with 5 or 6 ID's, you're the one who whines in EVERY topic they make, you're the one who said BILLIONS in the FB lawsuit, you're the one who cashed out $5 ago and still begging for $20 and $22 using Texassucksbig as one of the ID's. I've said for 5 YEARS that Alibaba was worth a fortune and even validated its price using Tencent, Sina, Baidu, etc. LONG before any analyst or Eric Jackson chimed in. What I must know is were you born with a vay jay jay??? I ask cause you never have the balls to reply and you certainly wait and wait hoping no one is here to make your topics. When have I EVER said Yahoo was worth $16? Last I checked, I'm LONG and up 15% in 6wks. Even my post after earnings said it was $23 using just the cash, accts receivable and the Asian assets not even giving the core a value. There is what you THINK and what is FACT...what you THINK is horribly wrong and FACT is where I sit.
